features.description: Powerful features designed to help you create, customize, and optimize your product demonstrations for maximum impact.

items.title: Lightning Fast Setup
items.description: Create professional demos in minutes, not hours.

items.title: Customizable Design
items.description: Match your brand perfectly with custom themes, colors, and layouts.

items.title: Advanced Analytics
items.description: Track engagement, conversion rates, and user behavior.

items.title: Enterprise Security
items.description: Bank-level security with SSO and GDPR compliance.

items.title: Mobile Optimized
items.description: Perfect viewing experience across all devices.

items.title: Easy Integration
items.description: Embed demos anywhere with simple code snippets.

steps.title: Upload Your Content

steps.description: Share via link, embed on your website, or present.

testimonials.title: Loved by Teams Worldwide
testimonials.description: Join thousands of companies that trust DemoGet to showcase their products and drive conversions.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: DemoGet transformed how we showcase our product. Our conversion rates increased by 300%.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.text: The ease of creating professional demos is incredible. Custom demos in minutes.

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.text: Explains our complex product simply. Analytics provide valuable insights.

gallery.title: Demo Gallery
gallery.description: Explore demos created by our community. Get inspired and see what's possible with DemoGet.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include our core features with no hidden fees.
pricing.footer_note: All plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required.
